artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,476); man at left with sword dressed in dark blue military uniform and a hat with a green and red plume; woman at right in a white gown with black trim and a hat with a black plume
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Septième Cahier, 25 Avril 1790
